Articles.Content:
Those of you who are on imgur may have already seen this...

http://imgur.com/gallery/AFmhnGr

LOL

P.S. Welcome back on Earth Chris!
That's funny. Getting used to gravity, I see.

Wonder whether the Kerbals have the same problem?

Also, welcome back Chris.
Notice that it's not actually his account, though. The real one is @Cmdr_Hadfield
I saw this joke going round Youtube for the last few days involving coffee, microphones, food etc. Understandable how it must be hard to get used to gravity again after 6 months
